availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Warren W. Ashby (Hopkins County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant's clerk)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, clerk and merchant's clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Ashby and Rosa Ashby. Student and farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Clerk in Hopkins County in 1860. Household owned two enslaved people in Hopkins County in 1860. Merchant's clerk in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 149B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 832.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 221A.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, June 1863, p. 21.
"Name (1831-1868)," Find A Grave, Memorial #69121711, accessed March 31, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69121711.
